Item ID1434

The dragon mace is the fifth-strongest mace stat-wise after the Tzhaar-ket-em. It can only be wielded by players who have an Attack level of at least 60 and who have completed the Heroes' Quest.

The mace can be purchased for 50,000 coins at the Happy Heroes' H'emporium in the Heroes' Guild, or from other players. It can also be obtained as a reward from elite clues and master clues or a possible reward from Soul Wars spoils of war.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player performing the dragon mace's special attack, Shatter.

The dragon mace has a special attack called Shatter, which increases the player's accuracy by 25% and damage by 50%, while rolling against the target's crush defence. This attack consumes 25% of the player's special attack energy.

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

Spiked
Combat OptionsCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost
PoundCrushAccurateAttack and Hitpoints+3 Attack
PummelCrushAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
SpikeStabControlledAttack, Strength, Defence, and Hitpoints+1 Attack, Strength, and Defence
BlockCrushDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Note that due to this weapon's crush bonus being significantly higher than its stab bonus, its Spike combat style is is generally less accurate than its crush combat styles.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The mace's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

25 February 2004
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The dragon mace has 17 spikes.

[[File:Dragon mace detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''dragon mace''' is the fifth-strongest [[mace]] stat-wise after the [[Tzhaar-ket-em]]. It can only be wielded by players who have an [[Attack]] level of at least 60 and who have completed the [[Heroes' Quest]].

The mace can be purchased for 50,000 coins at the [[Happy Heroes' H'emporium.|Happy Heroes' H'emporium]] in the [[Heroes' Guild]], or from other players. It can also be obtained as a reward from [[elite clue]]s and [[master clues]] or a possible reward from [[Soul Wars]] [[spoils of war]].

==Special attack==
[[File:Shatter.gif|frame|A player performing the dragon mace's special attack, ''Shatter''.]]
The dragon mace has a [[special attack]] called ''Shatter'', which increases the player's accuracy by 25% and damage by 50%, while rolling against the target's crush defence. This attack consumes 25% of the player's special attack energy.

==Combat styles==
{{CombatStyles|Spiked}}

Note that due to this weapon's crush bonus being significantly higher than its stab bonus, its ''Spike'' combat style is is generally less accurate than its crush combat styles.
